job.title: AI/ML - Machine Learning Software Engineer, ML Platform & Technology
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brApple builds worldclass innovative products that integrate hardware with intelligent software experiences using machine learning artificial intelligence and computer vision Machine Learning Platform and Technologies is the team that makes it possible for Apple engineers to innovate ML driven product features rapidly and at scale The team enables future Apple intelligent products by making cutting edge ML technologies large scale compute and data systems designed specifically for ML available to engineers within Apple Come join the team that is making ML innovation possible here at Apple brbrWere looking for strong software engineers to build a next generation Deep Learning framework geared towards fueling ondevice machine learning capabilities and emerging innovations Youll be part of a small team of developers and deep learning experts working in the area of deviceaware neural network optimization and neural architecture search Were looking for candidates with polished coding skills passionate about machine learning computational science and hardware Any background and experience level is acceptable In exchange we offer respectful work environment flexible set of responsibilities access to world class experts and growth opportunities in one of the best companies in the worldbrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brStrong Python programming skillsbrbrUnderstanding of data structures software design principles and algorithmsbrbrExperience with Python scientific libraries like numpy scipybrbrExperience with one or more deep learning framework such as Tensorflow PyTorch or Kerasbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong br Design and develop APIs for common and emerging deep learning primitives layers tensor operations optimizers and more specific hardware featuresbrbr     Implement efficient tensor operations and DNN training algorithmsbrbr     Train and evaluate DNNs for the purpose of benchmarking neural network optimization algorithms Our framework reduces latency and power consumption of neural networks found in many Apple productsbrbr     Perform research in emerging areas of efficient neural network development including quantization pruning compression and neural architecture search as well as novel differentiable compute primitivesbrbr     We encourage publishing novel research at top ML conferencesbrbr brstrongAdditional Requirementsbrstrong br Experience developing machine learning solutionsbrbr     Understanding of compute hardware design CPU and GPU architecturesbrbr     Experience with C ObjectiveC Swiftbrbr     iOS development experiencebrbr     Solid math skills linear algebra computational science and optimizationbrbr     Publication record in ML conferences is a plusbrbr brRole Number 200269763brbr
